page.title: 18LEISURE, WORDSLEY 1980'S
page.content: There is plenty of opportunity for {leisure time pursuits}and all the family tend to take advantage of this. The older generation tend to spend much of their leisure time at home gardening, cooking or reading. The youngsters enjoy swimming, jogging, youth club and a whole variety of sports. The more ambitious spend much of their time doing homework aspiring eventually to become a banker, nurse, air hostess, computer programmer, secretary, accountant or policeman. Most families have their annual holiday to look forward to,95% go away for at least one week each year and the remaining 5% have weekend outings. Wales is a popular venue for{holidays being our nearest coastal area, but many travel further afield, usually to the coast. Only a small percentage travel abroad for their holidays.
